009package Ch12_Ransac_Hough;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
012
013import java.awt.Color;
014import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
015
016import ij.IJ;
017import ij.ImagePlus;
018import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
019import ij.gui.Overlay;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
022import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
023import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
024import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughLine;
025import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughTransformLines;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
030import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
031
032/**
033 * <p>
034 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the {@link HoughTransformLines}
035 * class for detecting straight lines in images (see Sec. 12.2 of [1] for
036 * details). It expects a binary input image with background = 0 and foreground
037 * (contour) pixels with values &gt; 0. A vector overlay is used to display the
038 * detected lines. If no image is currently open, the plugin optionally loads a
039 * suitable sample image.
040 * </p>
041 * <p>
042 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
043 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
044 * </p>
045 * 
046 * @author WB
047 * @version 2022/10/03
048 */
049public class Hough_Line_Detect implements PlugInFilter {
050
051        private static int MaxLines = 5;                        // number of strongest lines to be found
052        private static int MinPointsOnLine = 50;        // min. number of points on each line
053
054        private static boolean ShowAccumulator = true;
055        private static boolean ShowExtendedAccumulator = false;
056        private static boolean ShowAccumulatorPeaks = false;
057        private static boolean ListStrongestLines = false;
058        private static boolean ShowLines = true;
059        private static boolean InvertOriginal = false;
060        
061        private static double  LineWidth = 0.5;
062        private static Color   LineColor = Color.magenta;
063        
064        private static boolean ShowReferencePoint = true;
065        private static Color   ReferencePointColor = Color.green;
066
067        private ImagePlus im;
068        
069        /**
070         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
071         * is currently open.
072         */
073        public Hough_Line_Detect() {
074                if (noCurrentImage()) {
075                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.NoisyLines);
076                }
077        }
078        
079        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
080
081        @Override
082        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
083                this.im = im;
084                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
085        }
086
087        @Override
088        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
089                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
090                        IJ.showMessage("Binary (edge) image required!");
091                        return;
092                }
093
094                HoughTransformLines.Parameters params = new HoughTransformLines.Parameters();
095
096                if (!showDialog(params)) //dialog canceled or error
097                        return; 
098
099                // compute the Hough Transform and retrieve the strongest lines:
100                HoughTransformLines ht = new HoughTransformLines((ByteProcessor)ip, params);
101                HoughLine[] lines = ht.getLines(MinPointsOnLine, MaxLines);
102
103                if (lines.length == 0) {
104                        IJ.log("No lines detected - check the input image and parameters!");
105//                      return;
106                }
107
108                if (ShowAccumulator){
109                        FloatProcessor accIp = ht.getAccumulatorImage();
110                        (new ImagePlus("Accumulator for " + im.getTitle(), accIp)).show();
111                }
112
113                if (ShowExtendedAccumulator){
114                        FloatProcessor accEx = ht.getAccumulatorImageExtended();
115                        (new ImagePlus("Extended accumulator for " + im.getTitle(), accEx)).show();
116                }
117
118                if (ShowAccumulatorPeaks) {
119                        FloatProcessor maxIp = ht.getAccumulatorMaxImage();
120                        (new ImagePlus("Accumulator peaks for " + im.getTitle(), maxIp)).show();
121                }
122
123                if (ListStrongestLines) {
124                        for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
125                                IJ.log(i + ": " + lines[i].toString());
126                        }
127                }
128                
129                if (ShowLines) {
130                        ImageProcessor lineIp = ip.duplicate();
131                        if (InvertOriginal) lineIp.invert();
132                        double lineLength = Math.hypot(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
133                        
134                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
135                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
136                        ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(LineWidth, LineColor));
137                        for (HoughLine hl : lines) {
138                                ola.addShape(hl.getShape(lineLength));
139                        }
140                        
141                        if (ShowReferencePoint) {
142                                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(0.5, ReferencePointColor));
143                                ola.addShape(markPoint(ht.getXref(), ht.getYref()));
144                        }
145
146                        ImagePlus lim = new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle()+"-lines", lineIp);
147                        lim.setOverlay(oly);
148                        lim.show();
149                }
150        }
151
152        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
153
154        private boolean showDialog(HoughTransformLines.Parameters params) {
155                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Hough Transform (lines)");
156                gd.addNumericField("Axial steps", params.nAng, 0);
157                gd.addNumericField("Radial steps", params.nRad, 0);
158                gd.addNumericField("Max. number of lines to show", MaxLines, 0);
159                gd.addNumericField("Min. number of points per line", MinPointsOnLine, 0);
160                gd.addCheckbox("Show accumulator", ShowAccumulator);
161                gd.addCheckbox("Show extended accumulator", ShowExtendedAccumulator);
162                gd.addCheckbox("Show accumulator peaks", ShowAccumulatorPeaks);
163                gd.addCheckbox("List strongest lines", ListStrongestLines);
164                gd.addCheckbox("Show lines", ShowLines);
165                gd.addNumericField("Line width", LineWidth, 1);
166                gd.addCheckbox("Show reference point", ShowReferencePoint);
167                
168                gd.showDialog();
169                if(gd.wasCanceled())
170                        return false;
171                
172                params.nAng = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
173                params.nRad = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
174                MaxLines = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
175                MinPointsOnLine = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
176                ShowAccumulator = gd.getNextBoolean();
177                ShowExtendedAccumulator = gd.getNextBoolean();
178                ShowAccumulatorPeaks = gd.getNextBoolean();
179                ListStrongestLines = gd.getNextBoolean();
180                ShowLines = gd.getNextBoolean();
181                LineWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
182                ShowReferencePoint = gd.getNextBoolean();
183                
184                if(gd.invalidNumber()) {
185                        IJ.showMessage("Error", "Invalid input number");
186                        return false;
187                }
188                return true;
189        }
190        
191        private Path2D markPoint(double xc, double yc) {
192                double markerSize = 2.0;
193                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
194                path.moveTo(xc - markerSize, yc);
195                path.lineTo(xc + markerSize, yc);
196                path.moveTo(xc, yc - markerSize);
197                path.lineTo(xc, yc + markerSize);
198                return path;
199        }
200
201}
